result.title: Background value and origin of Fluoride in water bodies, groundwater and soils in the target areas and hydrogeochemical model. Part 2
result.description: Hydrogeochemical model (origin of solutes and natural processes / human activities generating the high Fluoride levels in water bodies, groundwater and soils in the three target areas) will be performed by the use of multi-isotopic tools jointly with the interpretation of geochemistry, hydrogeological features, background values of F- and spatial examination of land uses.
